      int compare(Player o1, Player o2, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> secondaryRanking)
      compare players
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> finalScoring(Controller currentController, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
      this method scores the killshot track at the end of the fame it will: - score all boards that still have damage tokens, as usual but without killshot - score the killshot track: players (ordered by number of tokens) will get 8, 6, 4, 2, 1 points - ties in the score on the killshot track break in favor of the player that has the earliest token(s)
      int getNumberOfTurns()

      • finalScoring

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> finalScoring(Controller currentController,
                                                              java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
        this method scores the killshot track at the end of the fame it will: - score all boards that still have damage tokens, as usual but without killshot - score the killshot track: players (ordered by number of tokens) will get 8, 6, 4, 2, 1 points - ties in the score on the killshot track break in favor of the player that has the earliest token(s)
        Parameters:
        players - are all of the players in the game
        Returns:
        the player that has the highest score on the killshot track
